title: Lambda extesion to retrieve SSM and Secrets Values from PHP Lambda on CDK
description: The use of Lambda Extensions to retrieve SSM Parameter Store and Secrets Manager values for PHP Lambdas using CDK.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern shows how to add Lambda Extensions to retrieve SSM Parameter Store and Secrets Manager values for PHP Lambdas using CDK.
The PHP language usage on Serverless projects in AWS has been increasing. This pattern will be helpful for many developers migrating their projects to Serverless.
